alert.note: Alert for Macon; Northern Jackson; Swain (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 7:26PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Macon, west central Jackson and south central Swain Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 726 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Bryson City, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Franklin, Bryson City, Luada, Burningtown, Savannah, Alarka, Cullasaja and Cowee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
